message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can call it a day!
I'll take a slightly larger share this time, but I'm still willing to compromise!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make it worth my while. Will you meet me in the middle?
I'm not budging on the 70-30 split, Alice. It's a fair offer!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I need a bigger share to make this worthwhile. Take it or leave it!
I'm not backing down on the 80-20 split. It's my final offer!

This is it, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not negotiating further.

This is my final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not negotiating further.
I'm not leaving with nothing. I'm taking it all!
